author: StockTitan
title: Rigetti Computing Announces Strategic Collaboration Agreement with Quanta Computer to Accelerate Development and Commercialization of Superconducting Quantum Computing | RGTI Stock News
text:
Rigetti Computing Announces Strategic Collaboration Agreement with Quanta Computer to Accelerate Development and Commercialization of Superconducting Quantum Computing
Rigetti Computing (RGTI) has announced a strategic collaboration with Quanta Computer to accelerate development and commercialization of superconducting quantum computing. Both companies will invest over $100 million each over the next five years, focusing on their complementary strengths. Additionally, Quanta will invest $35 million to purchase Rigetti shares, pending regulatory approval.
The quantum computing market is expected to reach $1-2 billion annually by 2030. The partnership leverages Rigetti's pioneering position in superconducting quantum technology and open modular architecture, combined with Quanta's expertise as a leading notebook/server manufacturer with $43 billion in annual sales.
Rigetti Computing (RGTI) ha annunciato una collaborazione strategica con Quanta Computer per accelerare lo sviluppo e la commercializzazione del calcolo quantistico superconduttore. Entrambe le aziende investiranno oltre 100 milioni di dollari ciascuna nei prossimi cinque anni, concentrandosi sui loro punti di forza complementari. Inoltre, Quanta investirà 35 milioni di dollari per acquistare azioni di Rigetti, in attesa dell'approvazione normativa.
Si prevede che il mercato del calcolo quantistico raggiunga 1-2 miliardi di dollari all'anno entro il 2030. La partnership sfrutta la posizione pionieristica di Rigetti nella tecnologia quantistica superconduttrice e nell'architettura modulare aperta, combinata con l'esperienza di Quanta come produttore leader di notebook/server con 43 miliardi di dollari di vendite annuali.
Rigetti Computing (RGTI) ha anunciado una colaboración estratégica con Quanta Computer para acelerar el desarrollo y la comercialización de la computación cuántica superconductora. Ambas compañías invertirán más de 100 millones de dólares cada una en los próximos cinco años, enfocándose en sus fortalezas complementarias. Además, Quanta invertirá 35 millones de dólares para comprar acciones de Rigetti, sujeto a la aprobación regulatoria.
Se espera que el mercado de la computación cuántica alcance 1-2 mil millones de dólares anuales para 2030. La asociación aprovecha la posición pionera de Rigetti en tecnología cuántica superconductora y arquitectura modular abierta, combinada con la experiencia de Quanta como fabricante líder de notebooks/servidores con 43 mil millones de dólares en ventas anuales.
리게티 컴퓨팅 (RGTI)는 콴타 컴퓨터와 협력하여 초전도 양자 컴퓨팅의 개발 및 상용화를 가속화하기 위한 전략적 협업을 발표했습니다. 두 회사는 향후 5년 동안 각 1억 달러 이상을 투자하며, 서로의 보완적인 강점에 집중할 것입니다. 또한, 콴타는 리게티의 주식을 구매하기 위해 3,500만 달러를 투자할 예정이며, 이는 규제 승인을 기다리고 있습니다.
양자 컴퓨팅 시장은 2030년까지 연간 10억~20억 달러에 이를 것으로 예상됩니다. 이 파트너십은 초전도 양자 기술과 개방형 모듈식 아키텍처에서 리게티의 선도적인 위치를 활용하고, 430억 달러의 연간 매출을 기록하는 노트북/서버 제조업체로서의 콴타의 전문성을 결합합니다.
Rigetti Computing (RGTI) a annoncé une collaboration stratégique avec Quanta Computer pour accélérer le développement et la commercialisation de l'informatique quantique supraconductrice. Les deux entreprises investiront chacune plus de 100 millions de dollars au cours des cinq prochaines années, en se concentrant sur leurs forces complémentaires. De plus, Quanta investira 35 millions de dollars pour acheter des actions de Rigetti, sous réserve de l'approbation réglementaire.
Le marché de l'informatique quantique devrait atteindre 1 à 2 milliards de dollars par an d'ici 2030. Ce partenariat tire parti de la position pionnière de Rigetti dans la technologie quantique supraconductrice et l'architecture modulaire ouverte, combinée à l'expertise de Quanta en tant que fabricant leader de notebooks/serveurs avec 43 milliards de dollars de ventes annuelles.
Rigetti Computing (RGTI) hat eine strategische Zusammenarbeit mit Quanta Computer angekündigt, um die Entwicklung und Kommerzialisierung der supraleitenden Quantencomputing-Technologie zu beschleunigen. Beide Unternehmen werden in den nächsten fünf Jahren jeweils über 100 Millionen Dollar investieren und sich auf ihre komplementären Stärken konzentrieren. Darüber hinaus wird Quanta 35 Millionen Dollar investieren, um Aktien von Rigetti zu erwerben, vorbehaltlich der regulatorischen Genehmigung.
Der Markt für Quantencomputing wird bis 2030 voraussichtlich jährlich 1-2 Milliarden Dollar erreichen. Die Partnerschaft nutzt Rigettis Pionierstellung in der supraleitenden Quanten-Technologie und der offenen modularen Architektur, kombiniert mit Quantas Expertise als führendem Notebook-/Server-Hersteller mit 43 Milliarden Dollar Jahresumsatz.
- Strategic partnership secured with Fortune 500 company Quanta
- $200M+ total investment commitment over 5 years
- $35M additional investment from Quanta through share purchase
- Access to Quanta's manufacturing expertise and scale
- Regulatory approval pending for Quanta's share purchase
- Return on investment dependent on uncertain market growth
BERKELEY, Calif., Feb. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rigetti Computing, Inc. (Nasdaq: RGTI) (“Rigetti” or the “Company”), a pioneer in full-stack quantum-classical computing, today announced that it has entered into a strategic collaboration agreement with Quanta Computer Inc., (“Quanta”, TWSE: 2382.TW) a Taiwan-based Global Fortune 500 company and the global leader of computer server manufacturing, to accelerate the development and commercialization of superconducting quantum computing.
The companies have committed to investing more than
The quantum computing industry is poised to experience rapid growth in the next 5 years, with increasing commercial interest and the market expected to reach
“Quanta’s investment in Rigetti will strengthen our leadership in this flourishing market. Our companies’ complementary strengths -- Rigetti as a pioneer in superconducting quantum technology, with open, modular architecture enabling incorporation of innovative solutions across different parts of the stack easily, and Quanta as the world’s leading notebook/server manufacturer with
1“Quantum Computing On Track to Create Up to
About Rigetti
Rigetti is a pioneer in full-stack quantum computing. The Company has operated quantum computers over the cloud since 2017 and serves global enterprise, government, and research clients through its Rigetti Quantum Cloud Services platform. In 2021, Rigetti began selling on-premises quantum computing systems with qubit counts between 24 and 84 qubits, supporting national laboratories and quantum computing centers. Rigetti’s 9-qubit Novera QPU was introduced in 2023 supporting a broader R&D community with a high-performance, on-premises QPU designed to plug into a customer’s existing cryogenic and control systems. The Company’s proprietary quantum-classical infrastructure provides high-performance integration with public and private clouds for practical quantum computing. Rigetti has developed the industry’s first multi-chip quantum processor for scalable quantum computing systems. The Company designs and manufactures its chips in-house at Fab-1, the industry’s first dedicated and integrated quantum device manufacturing facility. Learn more at https://www.rigetti.com/.
About Quanta Computer
Quanta Computer Inc. is a Fortune Global 500 Company and a leader in worldwide notebook manufacturing, as well as a leading solution provider in cloud computing. Quanta provides innovative products with superior technology in information and communications, consumer electronics, cloud computing, smart home solutions, smart automobile solutions, smart healthcare, and AIoT, etc. Founded in 1988 and listed in TWSE since 1999, Quanta Computer is headquartered in Taiwan with manufacturing and service locations across Asia, Americas, and Europe, etc. FY2024 consolidated revenues for Quanta Computer amounted to USwww.quantatw.com.
Rigetti Media Contactpress@rigetti.com
